posts.post_content:
Hi all,

I am looking to buy or trade for T206 Tolstoi backed cards.  Beaters are welcome!

I need 1 more card to complete my T206 run of Waddell's (not including factory variations). 

-Sov350 Throwing

I also wouldn't mind an upgrade on:

-Sov150 Throwing
-SC350 Throwing
-Old Mill Throwing

If you have any available for sale or trade please let me know.

Thanks so much - Rob

Bump/Update

If anyone has a Waddell Sovereign 350 Throwing Pose available please let me know.

Thanks - Rob

Rob,

I have one but it's in my set. I'm not sure I would pull it unless I got an equally pretty card as the card has great eye appeal. 

But if you could come up with a card I feel looks just as nice I would consider the swap.

Cheers,

John

[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/piojohn3/ebay/websize/waddell.jpg[/IMG]
Great looking card John.  Unfortunately for me, right now I don't have an equally nice looking card that I could part with.
